                                      int _inpDim,
                                      double[] _input,
                                      double[] _output)
                               throws java.io.IOException

        Turns vector of strings into two double arrays, one for inputs and other for outputs.

        Parameters:
        _v - The vector
        _inpDim - Input dimension
        _input - Array in which INPUT values are returned
        _output - Array in which OUTPUT values are returned
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the dimension of inputs or outputs is 0

        Parameters:
        _a1 - First array
        _a2 - Second array
        _nDatos - Number of used data in the arrays (can be lower than _a1.length)
        Returns:
        Number of elements that match.
